oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Clarksville-Montgomery County Consolidated Government Charter Commission: Education Subcommittee Meeting Minutes, 1980
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In February 1980, the Chairperson of the Education Subcommittee, Faye Smalley, held public hearings that discussed the tentative language in the Proposed Charter pertaining to the Department of Education under metro Clarksville-Montgomery County.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Community development; Metropolitan government; Municipal charters; Education--Tennessee; Meetings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: 1980 Charter Commission
